conv.text: Hello, I'm a professor from HUJI. I heard you won the Hackathon of Generative AI. Congratulations! Can you tell me more about your project?

answers.option: No, I'd rather not talk about it.

conv.text: That's great! So tell me, what did you do to win the hackathon?

answers.option: I created a program that can generate realistic images from a set of parameters.

conv.text: Oh, ok. Well, congratulations on your win anyway!
That's incredible! What are the implications of your program?

answers.option: My program can be used to create realistic images for a variety of applications, from facial recognition to medical imaging.

conv.text: Wow, that's amazing! I'm really impressed with your work. Keep up the good work and I'm sure you will go far!
You're welcome! Good luck with your future endeavors!
